content:
CodeExporter Class

Definition

Represents a class that can generate proxy code from an XML representation of a data structure.

In this Article

public abstract class CodeExporter
Inheritance
System.Object
CodeExporter

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

Concrete implementations of this class include XmlCodeExporter and SoapCodeExporter.

Properties

IncludeMetadata

Gets a collection of code attribute metadata that is included when the code is exported.

public System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection IncludeMetadata { get; }
Value
CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection

A collection of CodeAttributeDeclaration objects that represent metadata that is included when the code is exported.

Remarks

Using this property, you can dynamically add attributes to exported proxy code.
